intent_atoms.description: Provide a comprehensive onboarding guide for new developers covering toolchain setup, repository bootstrap, architecture boundaries, and API reference outlines for ISOInspectorKit, CLI, and app targets.
The onboarding guide must be authored and published in Docs/Guides/DeveloperOnboarding.md.
The Getting Started guide must be refreshed to point newcomers at the onboarding manual and updated prerequisite versions to match the current toolchain baseline.
Task F3 is marked as complete across execution workplan and PRD trackers, indicating the published guide and archived task location.
The onboarding guide should remain synchronized with future DocC expansions and API changes, updating module outlines and contribution checklists as new surfaces ship.

functional_units.name: Developer Onboarding Guide
functional_units.description: Provides comprehensive instructions for new developers covering toolchain setup, repository bootstrap, architecture boundaries, and API reference outlines for ISOInspectorKit, CLI, and app targets.

functional_units.name: Getting Started Guide Update
functional_units.description: Updates the high-level Getting Started guide to direct newcomers to the onboarding manual and align prerequisite versions with current toolchain baseline.
